name: Boxy Supreme
description:
Boxy is a small indie game developed by one person. Its fast-paced, physics-based, puzzle mechanics are engaging and easy to understand. Guide the lil' green cube to the green goal. Seems easy, right?
If you bothered to read this far, please note Boxy is still a work in progress. I will be updating this game on a weekly basis. Keeping myself busy making adjustments and adding new content (such as art, music, mechanics, and levels) to keep you coming back for more. Feed back is crucial & appreciated. Thank you, Chris Tharp Art. :^)
